SELECT BOARD_VIDEO_NO, VIDEO_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VIDEO_LIKE L WHERE L.BOARD_VIDEO_NO = B.BOARD_VIDEO_NO ) LIKE_COUNT, (SELECT VIDEO_PATH FROM VIDEO V WHERE V.BOARD_VIDEO_NO = B.BOARD_VIDEO_NO) VIDEO_PATH, (SELECT VIDEO_RENAME FROM VIDEO V WHERE V.BOARD_VIDEO_NO = B.BOARD_VIDEO_NO) VIDEO_RENAME
FROM "VIDEO_BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE VIDEO_DEL_FL ='N' ORDER BY BOARD_VIDEO_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VIDEO_BOARD
JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO)
WHERE VIDEO_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND VIDEO_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%'
AND VIDEO_CONTENT LIKE '%${query}%'
AND (VIDEO_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%' OR VIDEO_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%')
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%${query}%'

SELECT BOARD_VIDEO_NO, VIDEO_TITLE, VIDEO_READCOUNT, MEMBER_NICKNAME,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VIDEO_LIKE L WHERE L.BOARD_VIDEO_NO = B.BOARD_VIDEO_NO ) LIKE_COUNT, (SELECT VIDEO_PATH FROM VIDEO V WHERE V.BOARD_VIDEO_NO = B.BOARD_VIDEO_NO) VIDEO_PATH, (SELECT VIDEO_RENAME FROM VIDEO V WHERE V.BOARD_VIDEO_NO = B.BOARD_VIDEO_NO) VIDEO_RENAME,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - VIDEO_WRITE_DATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - VIDEO_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - VIDEO_WRITE_DATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - VIDEO_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - VIDEO_WRITE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - VIDEO_WRITE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(VIDEO_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END VIDEO_WRITE_DATE
FROM "VIDEO_BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE VIDEO_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND VIDEO_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%'
AND VIDEO_CONTENT LIKE '%${query}%'
AND (VIDEO_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%' OR VIDEO_CONTENT LIKE '%${query}%')
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%${query}%'
ORDER BY BOARD_VIDEO_NO DESC
